title: ChenFec,MP3 Player with Bluetooth,32GB MP3 Players 2.4 Inch Large Screen Lossless Music High-Fidelity Sound Quality,Support Recording FM Kids Student Adult mp4 Player,Expandable Memory 128GB,Black
features: 【Wireless Bluetooth 5.0】- Mp3 Player with Bluetooth version 5.0, enjoy wireless music without delay. You can play music through your Bluetooth speaker or Bluetooth headset and enjoy high-fidelity stereo music with your wireless headset. You can also connect to other playback device to play music through the 3.5mm AUX cable.(PS: This player can only pair with Bluetooth speaker and Bluetooth headphone.)
description: 1.It allows you to play songs by playlist,album and artist under Bluetooth status which enables you quick selection. 2.Rewind/ fast forward ,folder and shuffle are available under bluetooth mode. 3. It is not only a mp3 player, can also be a FM radio.Because the mp3 player supports FM radio under bluetooth mode.( plug an earphone as an antenna ) ♪
We have updated the mp3 player, and add the speaker in the player. So, you can enjoy music without insert the headphone or link to Bluetooth speaker.  ♪
Play Music by Playlist, Shuffle Your Favorite Songs

The mp3 player build-in 3 default playlists. You can also create your playlists in your PC. You can shuffle all of the songs in the mp3 player. You can also shuffle one of the music folders of playlist.

♫Good exterior: the device is made of metallic material, high strength/shocking and crushing resistance ♫Lossless sound: the MP3 player has an equalizer to tune the sound to your liking ♫ FM radio: A built-in FM tuner, it supports Manual tune and Auto tune, receive the signal very easily

*Audio Format: Support: MP3 / WAV / APE / WMA / FLAC etc *Video Format: Support AMV with resolution of 128 x 160 *Voice Recorder: Support MP3 / WAV  *Picture Browse: support formats of JPEG/BMP (128*160) *e-Book: Support TXT format *FM Receiving Frequency: 87.5 MHz~108 MHz *Power supply: DC 5V 500mA Micro USB interface

Notes: 1. Please connect car speaker via AUX Cable. This music player is a Bluetooth transmitter, not a receiver. It cannot pair with phones. 2. If ever the mp3 crash, please hold on power button 10s to reset it.
1 x Bluetooth MP3 Player 1 x USB Cable 1 x Earphone 1 x User Manual
